title: OpenAI Responses Structured Output Reference (Strict Mode)
description: This schema is provided as a reference for Scoundrel developers. It demonstrates the structure OpenAI expects for json_schema-based structured outputs when using strict mode.

name.description: The schema name passed to OpenAI (required by the API).

strict.description: If true, the model must adhere to this schema exactly, with all required fields present and no extra keys.

schema.description: The actual JSON Schema definition describing the expected model output.

$schema.description: Reference to the JSON Schema standard, typically draft-07.

type.description: Root type is always an object for structured outputs.

properties.description: Defines allowed fields in the model output.

items.description: Schema for array elements, if this field is an array.

required.description: Array of property names that must be present in the model output.
